# Definition of Done

- [ ] End to End tests written
- [ ] Deployed to production
- [ ] works and looks good on all latest browsers
  - [ ] Mac
    - [ ] Safari
    - [ ] Firefox
    - [ ] Chrome
  - [ ] iPhone
    - [ ] Safari
  - [ ] iPad
    - [ ] Safari
  - [ ] Windows
    - [ ] Chrome
    - [ ] Firefox
    - [ ] Edge
